user_query: I'm organizing a conference for my company and I need to categorize the different teams. Can you fetch the categories for the team with ID 'abcd1234'? Also, I want to obtain the IP address of the attendees to automatically detect their language preferences using the HelloSalut API.

TaskList.description: Fetch the categories for the team with ID 'abcd1234'.
Obtain the IP address of the attendees.
